room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Game Coeur d'Alene in Coeur d'Alene
review: We had a group of 11 do the Bomb room tonight. It was quite fun and Nik was an awesome game master. We were able to figure out the entire room with 4 min to spare. Will definitely return and do this again as it was a blast. Also, don't hesitate, ESCAPE!

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Game Coeur d'Alene in Coeur d'Alene
review: My family had an incredible time! There were 12 of us in the Bomb room. We escaped with 4 minutes to spare! Nick was an awesome game master and it was such a fun event to do with out of town family visiting. Highly recommend this escape room!

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Game Coeur d'Alene in Coeur d'Alene
review: Awesome escape room! Did the Bomb Squad. We all had a great time! We'll be back again for the Museum Heist!

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Escape Game Coeur d'Alene in Coeur d'Alene
review: Worth every minute of the adventure! You don’t have to be a rocket scientist to figure out the clues, and kids of all ages can enjoy playing along! Although we didn’t disarm the bomb, our experience was so much fun that I can’t wait to come again! Everyone had an absolute blast! Definitely worthy of 5 stars.
